body: i have never made this public but......ik how hard it will be when your mother is having an affair....you just can't say or talk about it because your single word can destroy whole family....it will be nightmare for a kid but he is just so awesome that he moved on .....i just wish some people had his determined mind and calm resolve
More so than a hard NTR ending, this was a very good ending about a boy not only letting his mother go her own way to her heart's content but also he himself moving on. Good shit.
Why even show incest if you don't want them together

She is literally saying that she would pick Shuuji if he asked. I wouldn't have problem if it just was a full NTR ending but loosing the wincest just because you didn't asked and you just throw her back to him YOU DAMN PIECE OF SHIT! IT'S SO FUCKING UNSATISFYING
This was one of the best read i had
Tsuyatsuya plots are awesome.Sometimes the son got Ntred, sometimes he wins.I wish Fated Circle could do more translations.

Fuck this, I'm told that Shuuji and his mother will become closer in the next volume, but this is what you give to me ? Sure you give me that good vanilla in the end, but that's just too sad. Fuck this.
